summary: Completed comprehensive testing of warehouse management system focusing on file upload, alerts, and ImageUpload components. Backend APIs are 100% functional including new file upload and alerts endpoints. Frontend has critical JavaScript errors preventing forms from rendering properly.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
ui_bugs.details: React Select components are causing runtime errors that prevent forms from rendering properly. This affects both Equipamentos and Viaturas forms.

integration_issues.issue: ImageUpload component not rendering in forms due to JavaScript errors
integration_issues.details: The ImageUpload component exists in the code but is not rendering in the forms due to Select component errors breaking the form rendering.

integration_issues.issue: Send Alerts button works but no toast notification appears
integration_issues.details: The button is clickable and the backend processes the request correctly, but the frontend doesn't show the response message to the user.

passed_tests: Backend authentication (login, register, get user info) - 100%
Alerts send endpoint POST /api/alerts/send - 100% (domain verification required as expected)
All CRUD operations for equipamentos, viaturas, materiais, locais, obras - 100%
Dashboard summary endpoint with alerts and statistics - 100%
Frontend navigation to Equipamentos and Viaturas pages
Frontend Send Alerts button functionality (backend integration works)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical JavaScript errors in Select components that are preventing forms from rendering properly. The error 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' is breaking the Equipamentos and Viaturas forms, preventing the ImageUpload component from being accessible. Also fix the toast notification display for the Send Alerts functionality.
